products.title: Ash Rose Honeycomb Blackout Perfect Fit
products.description: Have you been struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated perfect fits blinds are a great way to cover each pane, whislt giving you style and privacy at the same time. The blackout pleated fabric will gently filter the light coming into your room, whislt still giving you privacy. Stuggling to cover your conservatory windows? Perfect fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no drilling required.

products.title: Rio Blackout Solar Iron Neat Fit Honeycomb Pleated Blind
products.description: Rio blackout solar is a honeycomb blackout pleated fabric, available in a wide range of tropical colours with an added bonus of a solar silver backing to block harmful uv rays. A dark grey shade,rio iron can be added to finish a modern grey-toned look, or in a bedroom/office. With the right accessories this blind adds a polished finished look to your room. Product id: db-nfpl0040 fabric colour: iron material: 100% polyester lining: reflective blackout silver backing - uv blocking headrail: white neat fit hardware with slide-in clips control type: folding pull down handle, minimum projection from glass to front of handle is 30mm.

Raio vanilla is a great addition to a kitchen or conervatory with plants to help dress the room.

products.title: Luna Blackout Taupe Beige Perfect Fit
products.description: Luna blackouttaupe beige perfect fit pleated blind. Part of ourluna blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "luna blackout" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.
